column4: Is there a gadget or a giszmo that will tell me my ACTIVE Network Traffic measures? i have the sysmonitor, but it doesnt give me numbers..
Im getting mad- anyone wanna Chat, I am at a hotel and having Issues with my internet.
close- i was looking for something a little more of a Widget, or Gui interface. The Hotel is limiting my bandwidth and i wanna watch it before i figure out how to take action
